reviewText: My 6 year old loves this DVD.  I have my own gun safety DVD's and he will sit and watch them with me but he wanted his very own.  Now he invites me to sit and watch this with him.
Teaching my children gun safety. No gun in our house, but knowing what to do elsewhere seems like the right approach to us. Good starter video.
Gift for grandchild. He loves it. Recommend to all.
Old videos that appears to have taken in 1990s. Nothing wrong there but I wish the video quality is better for today's hidef TV.

I'm hoping there remains a need for this video in the U.S. with threats of a ban on guns. As it stands, we bought this for our children who still only use toy guns, with our oldest moving into airsoft "weaponry." All of the kids enjoy watching the comprehensive DVD. They know that it's a must if they plan on using any potentially dangerous guns, whether Nurf, airsoft etc. We haven't decided when we'll let them shoot BB guns or go to the firing rang, but this DVD has taught them virtually everything they need to know when the time comes.
